item.title: Blog Theme/博客主题
item.description: 本博客的主题基于默认主题hugo-lithium 进行了一些微小的改动。传送门 在使用过程中有什么不满意的地方会自己尝试修改，并在这里不定期更新。 修改菜单栏，添加目录标签 直接在config.toml上修改， [[menu.main]] name = "About" url = "/about/" weight = "2" [[menu.main]] name = "Categories" url = "/Categories/" weight = "3" [[menu.main]] name = "Tags" url = "/Tags/" weight = "4" [[menu.main]] name = "GitHub" url = "https://github.com/huanghaicheng1024" weight = "5" weight表示顺序。 2020-6-1 反正没什么人会点击我的GitHub，改写了一下footer.html，可以自定义类似RSS feed的footer内容。只需在config.toml设置 [[menu.footer]] name = "GitHub" url = "https://github.com/huanghaicheng1024" weight = "1" 更换图标 下载喜欢的图标的两个文件(.ico,.png),分别为博客左上角图片与浏览器标签页上面的图标，分别放在主题文件夹/static/images,/static，修改config.toml上favicon与[params.logo]的值。 添加自定义CSS config.toml添加代码 # Custom CSS.

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.
